poem:
Title: "In inked Accusations"

The innocent, embattled,
In silent confrontation,
Against the Office, worn and rattled, 
Speak through TV narration.

Against the unjust measure,
A tale untold they cast,
Mr Bates their treasure,
A hope to right the past. 

Quietly they scrawl,
Unraveling a true scandal,
In words they install
Their fight too hard to handle.
